programlisting:
<Extension exec> Module xm_exec </Extension>
<Input in> Module im_tcp Host 0.0.0.0 Port 1514 Exec if $raw_event =~ /alertcondition/ { \ exec_async("/bin/sh", "-c", 'echo "' + $Hostname + '\n\nRawEvent:\n' + $raw_event + \ '"|/usr/bin/mail -a "Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8" -s "ALERT" ' \ + 'user@domain.com' ); \ } </Input>
<Output out> Module om_file File "/var/log/messages" </Output>
<Route r> Path in => out </Route>
